# Contributor Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge
We pledge to create a professional, respectful environment for all contributors.

## Our Standards
- Use welcoming and inclusive language.
- Respect differing viewpoints and experiences.
- Give and gracefully accept constructive feedback.
- Focus on what is best for the community.
- Show empathy toward other community members.

Unacceptable behavior includes:
- Harassment, trolling, or derogatory comments.
- Publishing others' private information without permission.
- Any other conduct that could reasonably be considered inappropriate.

## Enforcement
Report unacceptable behavior to `patrikm53@gmail.com`. Violations will be reviewed and addressed appropriately, from warnings to removal from the project.
